info.title: Release Candidate Messages
info.description: The specifications of messages which are ready for ICAR approval and release

get.summary: Get available schema/id combinations for locations.
get.description:
# Purpose
Provide a list of available locations.
Should return only those combinations the user currently logged in has access to.

200.description: Successful. The response contains the available locations.

get.summary: Get the milking-withdrawals for a certain location
get.description:
# Purpose
Provides the milking-withdrawals for a certain location

200.description: Successful. The response contains the withdrawals for the given location.

get.summary: Get the data for milking visits
get.description:
# Purpose
Provides data from visits of animals to a milking parlour.
 
This comprises all possible data. Anybody can choose to define API's that return less information in the response.

200.description: Successful. The response contains the milking results for the given location

get.summary: Get the test days
get.description:
# Purpose
Provides data from the test days on a farm that intersects with the given start/end date if provided. Otherwise returns all available entries.

200.description: Successful. The response contains the test days for the given location

get.summary: Get the data for test day results
get.description:
# Purpose
Provides data from the test day for animals on a farm

200.description: Successful. The response contains the test day results for the given location

get.summary: Get the milk predictions for a certain location
get.description:
# Purpose
Provides the milk predictions for a location

200.description: Successful. The response contains the milk predictions for the given location.

get.summary: Get daily averages for milking-visits of a animals
get.description:
# Purpose
Provides daily averages of the milking-visits of per animal.

200.description: Successful. The response contains the daily averages per animal for the given location

get.summary: Get the data for lactations
get.description:
# Purpose
Provides data from lactations of animals.

200.description: Successful. The response contains the milking results for the given location

get.summary: Get the list of observed changes to lactation status for animals.
get.description:
# Purpose
Provides a list of events arising from observed changes to lactation status.

200.description: Successful. The response contains the milking results for the given location

get.summary: Get the births for a certain location
get.description:
# Purpose
Provides the born animals on a location

200.description: Successful. The response contains the births for the given location

get.summary: Get the deaths for a certain location
get.description:
# Purpose
Provides the died animals on a location

200.description: Successful. The response contains the died animals for the given location

get.summary: Get the arrivals for a certain location
get.description:
# Purpose
Provides the arrived animals on a location

200.description: Successful. The response contains the arrived animals for the given location

get.summary: Get the departures for a certain location
get.description:
# Purpose
Provides the departed animals from a location

200.description: Successful. The response contains the milking results for the given location

get.summary: Get the animals for a certain location
get.description:
# Purpose
Provides the animals on a location

200.description: Successful. The response contains the animals for the given location

get.summary: Get the animal sets for a certain location
get.description:
# Purpose
Provides the animal sets on a location. If animal-scheme and animal-id are provided, the sets containing that animal are returned.

200.description: Successful. The response contains the animal sets for the given location

get.summary: Get the animal set join events for a certain location
get.description:
# Purpose
Provides the animal set join events on a location

200.description: Successful. The response contains the join animal set events of animals for the given location

get.summary: Get the animal set leave events for a certain location
get.description:
# Purpose
Provides the animal set leave events on a location

200.description: Successful. The response contains the leave animal set events of animals for the given location

get.summary: Get the service sires matching your query parameters - for now we only implement the query by some identifier, like lifetime number, ai-code, ...
get.description:
# Purpose
Provides the service sires.
Only animal fields relevant to service sires will be populated (location is not expected, for example).

200.description: Successful. The response contains the service sires matching your query parameters

get.summary: Get the statistics for a certain location
get.description:
# Purpose
Provides the statistics for a location
 One can specify the period for which the statistics can be calculated by specifying a date to and date from parameter. Also the purpose can be provided to limit the purpose of the statistics

200.description: Successful. The response contains the statistics for the given location.

200.description: Successful. The response contains the pregnancy diagnosis for the given location

200.description: Successful. The response contains the abortion events for the given location

200.description: Successful. The response contains the weight results for the given location

200.description: Successful. The response contains the breeding values of the animals of the given location

get.summary: Get the gestations for a certain location
get.description:
# Purpose
Provides the gestations for a location

200.description: Successful. The response contains the gestations for the given location.

get.summary: Get the feeds available on a certain location
get.description:
# Purpose
Provides the feeds for a location. We recommend using the fao.org scheme for the type of feeds and the icar.org scheme for the feed properties

200.description: Successful. The response contains the feeds for the given location.

get.summary: Get the rations for a certain location
get.description:
# Purpose
Provides the rations for a location

200.description: Successful. The response contains the rations for the given location.

200.description: Successful. The response contains the feed intakes for the given location.

get.summary: Get the group feeding events for a certain location

200.description: Successful. The response contains the feed intakes for the given location.

get.summary: Get the feed recommendations for a certain location

Provides the feed recommendations for a location

200.description: Successful. The response contains the rations for the given location.

get.summary: Get the feed reports for animals on a certain location for a certain period. One can use the report-start- and report-end-date-time paramters to get a daily feed report.
get.description:
# Purpose
Provides the feed reports for animal on a location

200.description: Successful. The response contains the feed reports for animals on the given location.

get.summary: Get the list of observed changes to animal reproductive status
get.description:
# Purpose
Provides a collection of events where a change to animal reproductive status has been observed.

200.description: Successful. The response contains the reproductive status change observations for the given location.

get.summary: Get the list of schemata/schema types supported
get.description:
# Purpose
Provides a list of schemata/schema types supported.

200.description: Successful. The response contains the suppoted schemata for the given location.

get.summary: Get the list of schema type schemes
get.description:
# Purpose
Provides a list of schemata/schema types supported.

200.description: Successful. The response contains the suppoted scheme for specific scheme type for the given location.

get.summary: Get the list of values for specidif sheme
get.description:
# Purpose
Provides a list of scheme values for specific scheme

200.description: Successful. The response contains the suppoted scheme for specific scheme type for the given location.

get.summary: Get attention events.
get.description:
# Purpose
Provides the attention events for a location. These are individual animal events, typically generated by devices such as wearables and sensors.

200.description: Successful. The response contains the attention event resources for the given location.

location-scheme.name: location-scheme
location-scheme.description: The scheme id for the location identifier.

location-id.name: location-id
location-id.description: The unique identifier for the location.

meta-modified-from.name: meta-modified-from
meta-modified-from.description: The start of the date-time range for the data to get in the request.

meta-modified-to.name: meta-modified-to
meta-modified-to.description: The end of the date-time range for the data to get in the request.

date-from.name: date-to
date-from.description: The end of the date range for the period for which data is needed, the date inclusive.

date-to.name: date-from
date-to.description: The start of the date range for the period for which data is needed, the date inclusive.

report-start-date-time.name: report-start-date-time
report-start-date-time.description: The start of the date-time range for the data to get in the request based on the event date time.

report-end-date-time.name: report-end-date-time
report-end-date-time.description: The end of the date-time range for the data to get in the request based on the event date time.

animal-scheme.name: animal-scheme
animal-scheme.description: The scheme id for the animal identifier.

animal-id.name: animal-id
animal-id.description: The unique identifier for the animal.

scheme-type.name: scheme-type
scheme-type.description: The unique identifier scheme type (location, trait, breed)

identifier-id.name: identifier-id
identifier-id.description: The unique identifier within a scheme.

default.description: An error has occured while handling the request. Check the content of the message for the error details.

value.summary: Example of insemination event messages from finnish milk recording organization
Example of pregnancy check event messages from finnish milk recording organization
Example of drying off event messages from finnish milk recording organization
Example of drying off event messages from swedish milk recording organization
